file_content.text: Stop! I yield! I yield!
The base is secure. I need a squad to take Lord Loyat into custody.
Arrest her.
But... Darth Arho always claimed the dark side was stronger than the light. He swore the Empire would always triumph over the Republic.
He lied to me. He used me. And then he betrayed me. I'm nothing but a fool.
Now you see the truth. You still have to pay for your crimes against the Republic, but it's not too late to choose a different path.
You can still change.
You have to pay for your crimes against the Republic. But if you cooperate, you'll be shown mercy.
You can still change.
Thank you. Your words give me... comfort. Something I have not felt in a long, long time.
If you're stupid enough to trust someone like Darth Arho, then you deserve whatever you get.
I'll say.
I deserve your scorn. But heed my words: When you encounter Darth Arho, do not be so merciful. Spare his life and he will make you regret it.
I'm not finished with your master. There will be a reckoning.
Don't worry, he'll pay, too.
I hope you're right. I want him to suffer for what he did to me.
Take her into custody. I need to get back. Agent Bradber is waiting for me.
I can't let you live.
Too late. [Kill her]
Then make it quick!
It's over, Lord Loyat.
I don't know how you found me, Jedi, but coming here was a mistake.
Ah, the leader of the infamous Havoc Squad. Your reputation is well-earned, but coming here is suicide.
So, Rans has sent the great champion of the Jedi to challenge me? Your martial skills are legendary, but you will not succeed here.
If it isn't the Republic's dirty little secret--the one the army and the Jedi turn to when they fail. But this is one mission you should have refused!
At least you were wise enough not to challenge me alone. Unfortunately, you and your companions will all suffer the same fate.
You have no idea what torment you are about to suffer! I am Darth Arho's personal apprentice! Those who hear my master's name tremble in fear!
Your master's not that special. The galaxy is full of brutal thugs.
That's nothing to be proud of.
I don't see your master anywhere. It's just you and me.
But he's not here.
Sorry, but it takes more than words to make me tremble.
Is that supposed to scare me?
You know nothing of my Darth Arho. He embodies all the Dark Council represents. His wrath is legendary!
Master, hurry to my side! Together we will destroy these Republic fools!
Darth Arho? Can you hear me? It is I, Lord Loyat...! Master? Are you there?
I'm just as disappointed he's not showing up as you are. Taking you both out in one battle would have made things so much simpler for me.
Too bad. I'd like to meet him.
You really thought lover-boy was coming. Talk about a bad breakup.
Oh, that's gotta hurt.
Did you really believe he'd risk himself to save you? For a Sith Lord, you still have a lot to learn about the dark side.
The Sith have no loyalty.
He wouldn't abandon me. This... this must be a test. Yes. A test of my strength.
Your master isn't coming. It's just you and me, and you can't win this battle. Drop your weapons and I promise you'll be treated fairly.
Surrender and you can live.
Arho may have abandoned me, but I still command the power of the dark side!
Nobody's going to save you now!
Let's do this. [Attack her]
I will destroy you myself, and prove to my master I am worthy to serve him!
